summary: A romantic comedy about an Indian stuntman who takes Hollywood by storm but cannot find true love.
cast: Sylvester Stallone|Denise Richards|Whoopi Goldberg|Brandon Routh|Akshay Kumar|Holly Valance|Kareena Kapoor|Boman Irani|Aftab Shivdasani|Diane Sellers|Javed Jaffrey|Amrita Arora|Kirron Kher|Patrick Mölleken|Raeann Giles|Ashwin Mushran|Vindu Dara Singh|Kahkashan Patel|Alyona Khmara|Mikandrew|Rajesh Khera|Vanessa Alameda|Sophia Lin|Sheridan Crist|David Tran|Lewie Wickham|Bayli Johnston|Andrea Harrison|Sandra Mahanna|Bill Marinella|Shanna Olson|Brittany Alexis Phillips|Stuart Rigby|Peter Sands|Tatiana Turan
title: Kambakkht Ishq
